model

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    This is the Ball class, which is what is drawn on the screen, and implements Observer to use dispatching.
    Author:
    sn32, kyl3, lka2, swong

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.awt.Color col
      This is a private variable that holds the color of the ball.
      private java.awt.Container con
      This is a private variable which holds the Container (component) that the ball is drawn on.
      private int itr
      This private variable is an iteration counter that we use to decide when to change certain characteristics in the update strategy.
      private java.awt.Point loc
      This is a private variable which holds the location of the ball.
      private IPaintStrategy paintStrat
      This is a private variable that holds the current paint strategy of the ball.
      private int rad
      This is a private variable which holds the radius of the ball.
      private int radDelta
      This is a private variable that sets how much the ball's radius should change when we want to update the radius.
      private IUpdateStrategy strat
      This is a private variable that holds the current movement strategy of the ball.
      private java.awt.Point vel
      This is a private variable which holds the velocity of the ball in both directions.

      • Ball

        public Ball(java.awt.Color col,
            java.awt.Point loc,
            int rad,
            java.awt.Point vel,
            java.awt.Container con,
            IUpdateStrategy updateStrat,
            IPaintStrategy paintStrat)
        This is the Ball constructor, which sets its initial values.
        Parameters:
        col - The color of the ball
        loc - The initial location of the ball.
        rad - The radius of the ball.
        vel - The initial velocity of the ball.
        con - The container (component) on which the ball is drawn.
        updateStrat - The IUpdateStrategy that decides how to update the ball.
        paintStrat - The IPaintStrategy that decides how to paint the ball.

      • bounce

        public void bounce()
        This function checks to see if the ball has come into contact with one of the boundaries of the panel. If it has, this function reverses the velocity of the ball, simulating a rebound off of the wall. If, due to the delay of the GUI thread, the ball has passed one of the panel boundaries, this function moves the ball to the location it would be at if it had properly bounced off of the wall, and sets the velocity to its appropriate value.

      • getPaintStrat

        public IPaintStrategy getPaintStrat()

        Returns:

        Parameters:
